mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic, goods_area, goods_catgsecondId, goods_showStatus, goods_shelfTime, goods_count, goods_brand, goods_use,goods_descript
mapper.insert: insert into nove_goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic, goods_area, goods_catgsecondId, goods_showStatus, goods_shelfTime, goods_count, goods_brand, goods_use, goods_descript) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCatgsecondid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsShowstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsShelftime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDescript,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update nove_goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_area = #{goodsArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_catgsecondId = #{goodsCatgsecondid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_showStatus = #{goodsShowstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_shelfTime = #{goodsShelftime,jdbcType=DATE},
goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_brand = #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_use = #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_descript = #{goodsDescript,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update nove_goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_area = #{goodsArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_catgsecondId = #{goodsCatgsecondid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_showStatus = #{goodsShowstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_shelfTime = #{goodsShelftime,jdbcType=DATE}, goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_brand = #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_use = #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_descript = #{goodsDescript,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update nove_goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_area = #{goodsArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_catgsecondId = #{goodsCatgsecondid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_showStatus = #{goodsShowstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_shelfTime = #{goodsShelftime,jdbcType=DATE}, goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_brand = #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_use = #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.goods_descript,a.goods_brand,a.goods_use, a.goods_name,a.goods_pic,a.goods_area, b.goods_price,b.goods_size from nove_goods a LEFT JOIN nove_goodssize b ON a.goods_id=b.goodsId WHERE a.goods_id=#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
